abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

pokedexEntries.sword: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.
pokedexEntries.shield: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

pokedexEntries.sword: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
pokedexEntries.shield: Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength. Sunlight also makes the bud on its back grow larger.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
pokedexEntries.shield: A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower. The fragrance becalms those engaged in a battle.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.description: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.

pokedexEntries.sword: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.
pokedexEntries.shield: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.description: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.

pokedexEntries.sword: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.
pokedexEntries.shield: If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.description: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.

pokedexEntries.sword: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its wings can carry this Pokémon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

pokedexEntries.sword: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.
pokedexEntries.shield: When it feels threatened, it draws its limbs inside its shell and sprays water from its mouth.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

pokedexEntries.sword: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.
pokedexEntries.shield: It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

pokedexEntries.sword: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.
pokedexEntries.shield: The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.description: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

pokedexEntries.sword: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.
pokedexEntries.shield: Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell, the body inside is tender. It can’t withstand a harsh attack.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.description: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.description: Powers up “not very effective” moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
pokedexEntries.shield: It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.description: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.description: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

pokedexEntries.sword: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.
pokedexEntries.shield: When Pikachu meet, they’ll touch their tails together and exchange electricity through them as a form of greeting.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.
pokedexEntries.shield: If its electric pouches run empty, it raises its tail to gather electricity from the atmosphere.

abilities.name: Friend Guard
abilities.description: Reduces damage done to allies.

pokedexEntries.sword: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its adorable behavior and cry make it highly popular. However, this cute Pokémon is rarely found.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

abilities.name: Magic Guard
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from indirect damage.

abilities.name: Unaware
abilities.description: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.
pokedexEntries.shield: Their ears are sensitive enough to hear a pin drop from over a mile away, so they’re usually found in quiet places.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

abilities.name: Drought
abilities.description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

pokedexEntries.sword: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.
pokedexEntries.shield: As each tail grows, its fur becomes more lustrous. When held, it feels slightly warm.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

abilities.name: Drought
abilities.description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

pokedexEntries.sword: It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.
pokedexEntries.shield: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.description: Raises Special Attack when the Pokémon's stats are lowered.

abilities.name: Friend Guard
abilities.description: Reduces damage done to allies.

abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.
pokedexEntries.shield: During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.description: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles.
pokedexEntries.shield: What appears to be drool is actually sweet honey. It is very sticky and clings stubbornly if touched.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.description: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

pokedexEntries.sword: It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.
pokedexEntries.shield: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.description: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.description: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

abilities.name: Wonder Skin
abilities.description: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Arena Trap
abilities.description: Prevents the foe from fleeing.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: If a Diglett digs through a field, it leaves the soil perfectly tilled and ideal for planting crops.
pokedexEntries.shield: It burrows through the ground at a shallow depth. It leaves raised earth in its wake, making it easy to spot.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Arena Trap
abilities.description: Prevents the foe from fleeing.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.
pokedexEntries.shield: These Diglett triplets dig over 60 miles below sea level. No one knows what it’s like underground.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: The Pokémon may pick up items.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

pokedexEntries.sword: It loves to collect shiny things. If it’s in a good mood, it might even let its Trainer have a look at its hoard of treasures.
pokedexEntries.shield: It washes its face regularly to keep the coin on its forehead spotless. It doesn’t get along with Galarian Meowth.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

pokedexEntries.sword: Getting this prideful Pokémon to warm up to you takes a lot of effort, and it will claw at you the moment it gets annoyed.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its elegant and refined behavior clashes with that of the barbaric Perrserker. The relationship between the two is one of mutual disdain.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

abilities.name: Cloud Nine
abilities.description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.description: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.

pokedexEntries.sword: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.
pokedexEntries.shield: Extremely loyal, it will fearlessly bark at any opponent to protect its own Trainer from harm.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.description: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.

pokedexEntries.sword: The sight of it running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night has captivated many people.
pokedexEntries.shield: A Pokémon that has long been admired for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

abilities.name: Steadfast

pokedexEntries.sword: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it’s the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.
pokedexEntries.shield: Always brimming with power, it passes time by lifting boulders. Doing so makes it even stronger.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its formidable body never gets tired. It helps people by doing work such as the moving of heavy goods.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

pokedexEntries.sword: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.
pokedexEntries.shield: With four arms that react more quickly than it can think, it can execute many punches at once.

pokedexEntries.sword: It can’t run properly when it’s newly born. As it races around with others of its kind, its legs grow stronger.
pokedexEntries.shield: If you’ve been accepted by Ponyta, its burning mane is mysteriously no longer hot to the touch.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

pokedexEntries.sword: This Pokémon can be seen galloping through fields at speeds of up to 150 mph, its fiery mane fluttering in the wind.
pokedexEntries.shield: The fastest runner becomes the leader, and it decides the herd’s pace and direction of travel.

abilities.description: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

pokedexEntries.sword: The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food.
pokedexEntries.shield: They use a plant stalk as a weapon, but not all of them use it in the same way. Several distinct styles of stalk fighting have been observed.

pokedexEntries.sword: It swims facing backward by opening and closing its two-piece shell. It is surprisingly fast.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Skill Link
abilities.description: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from weather damage.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered, even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it is attacking.
pokedexEntries.shield: Once it slams its shell shut, it is impossible to open, even by those with superior strength.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.
pokedexEntries.shield: With its gas-like body, it can sneak into any place it desires. However, it can be blown away by wind.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes.
pokedexEntries.shield: If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness when nobody is around, Haunter is there.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be Gengar’s doing.
pokedexEntries.shield: It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

pokedexEntries.sword: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.
pokedexEntries.shield: It rapidly bores through the ground at 50 mph by squirming and twisting its massive, rugged body.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

abilities.name: Forewarn
abilities.description: Determines what moves a foe has.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

abilities.description: Determines what moves a foe has.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

pokedexEntries.sword: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.
pokedexEntries.shield: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its oversized claw is very powerful, but when it’s not in battle, the claw just gets in the way.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.description: Gives immunity to <q>sound-based</q> moves.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

abilities.description: Gives immunity to <q>sound-based</q> moves.

abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Harvest
abilities.description: May create another Berry after one is used.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Reckless
abilities.description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

pokedexEntries.sword: This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.
pokedexEntries.shield: The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.description: Boosts the power of punching moves.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

abilities.name: Cloud Nine
abilities.description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

abilities.name: Neutralizing Gas
abilities.description: Neutralizes abilities of all Pokémon in battle.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.description: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its body is full of poisonous gas. It floats into garbage dumps, seeking out the fumes of raw, rotting trash.
pokedexEntries.shield: It adores polluted air. Some claim that Koffing used to be more plentiful in the Galar region than they are now.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

abilities.name: Neutralizing Gas
abilities.description: Neutralizes abilities of all Pokémon in battle.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.description: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

pokedexEntries.sword: It mixes gases between its two bodies. It’s said that these Pokémon were seen all over the Galar region back in the day.
pokedexEntries.shield: It can’t suck in air quite as well as a Galarian Weezing, but the toxins it creates are more potent than those of its counterpart.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

abilities.name: Reckless
abilities.description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

pokedexEntries.sword: Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging tackles.
pokedexEntries.shield: It can remember only one thing at a time. Once it starts rushing, it forgets why it started.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

abilities.name: Reckless
abilities.description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

pokedexEntries.sword: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.
pokedexEntries.shield: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: All status problems heal when it switches out.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.description: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

abilities.name: Healer
abilities.description: May heal an ally's status conditions.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.description: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.description: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.description: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

abilities.name: Scrappy
abilities.description: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave elegantly in water. That is why it is known as the Water Dancer.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its dorsal and pectoral fins are strongly developed like muscles. It can swim at a speed of five knots.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

pokedexEntries.sword: In autumn, its body becomes more fatty in preparing to propose to a mate. It takes on beautiful colors.
pokedexEntries.shield: Using its horn, it bores holes in riverbed boulders, making nests to prevent its eggs from washing away.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: All status problems heal when it switches out.

abilities.name: Analytic
abilities.description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: All status problems heal when it switches out.

abilities.name: Analytic
abilities.description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.description: Gives immunity to <q>sound-based</q> moves.

abilities.name: Filter
abilities.description: Reduces damage from super-effective attacks.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: The broadness of its hands may be no coincidence—many scientists believe its palms became enlarged specifically for pantomiming.
pokedexEntries.shield: It’s known for its top-notch pantomime skills. It protects itself from all sorts of attacks by emitting auras from its fingers to create walls.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

abilities.name: Forewarn
abilities.description: Determines what moves a foe has.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.description: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.description: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

abilities.name: Anger Point
abilities.description: Maxes Attack after taking a critical hit.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.description: Bug, Ghost or Dark type moves scare it and boost its Speed.

pokedexEntries.sword: It is virtually worthless in terms of both power and speed. It is the most weak and pathetic Pokémon in the world.
pokedexEntries.shield: This weak and pathetic Pokémon gets easily pushed along rivers when there are strong currents.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.description: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: It has an extremely aggressive nature. The Hyper Beam it shoots from its mouth totally incinerates all targets.
pokedexEntries.shield: Once it begins to rampage, a Gyarados will burn everything down, even in a harsh storm.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

pokedexEntries.sword: A smart and kindhearted Pokémon, it glides across the surface of the sea while its beautiful song echoes around it.
pokedexEntries.shield: Crossing icy seas is no issue for this cold-resistant Pokémon. Its smooth skin is a little cool to the touch.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Imposter
abilities.description: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.

pokedexEntries.sword: It can reconstitute its entire cellular structure to change into what it sees, but it returns to normal when it relaxes.
pokedexEntries.shield: When it encounters another Ditto, it will move faster than normal to duplicate that opponent exactly.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.description: Powers up moves of the same type.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: It has the ability to alter the composition of its body to suit its surrounding environment.
pokedexEntries.shield: Thanks to its unstable genetic makeup, this special Pokémon conceals many different possible evolutions.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

pokedexEntries.sword: When Vaporeon’s fins begin to vibrate, it is a sign that rain will come within a few hours.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its body’s cellular structure is similar to the molecular composition of water. It can melt invisibly in water.

abilities.name: Volt Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

abilities.name: Quick Feet
abilities.description: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

pokedexEntries.sword: If it is angered or startled, the fur all over its body bristles like sharp needles that pierce foes.
pokedexEntries.shield: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10,000-volt lightning bolts.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

pokedexEntries.sword: Once it has stored up enough heat, this Pokémon’s body temperature can reach up to 1,700 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedexEntries.shield: It stores some of the air it inhales in its internal flame pouch, which heats it to over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.

abilities.name: Trace
abilities.description: The Pokémon copies a foe's Ability.

abilities.name: Download
abilities.description: Adjusts power according to a foe's defenses.

abilities.name: Analytic
abilities.description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

abilities.name: Immunity
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

pokedexEntries.sword: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.
pokedexEntries.shield: This Pokémon’s stomach is so strong, even eating moldy or rotten food will not affect it.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

abilities.name: Marvel Scale
abilities.description: Ups Defense if there is a status problem.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

abilities.name: Marvel Scale
abilities.description: Ups Defense if there is a status problem.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

abilities.name: Multiscale
abilities.description: Reduces damage when HP is full.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

pokedexEntries.sword: Created from the DNA of Mew, this Pokémon is a dangerous combination of overwhelming power and a savage heart.
pokedexEntries.shield: The research efforts of a certain scientist ultimately resulted in this Pokémon. Its powers are dedicated to battling.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.description: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

pokedexEntries.sword: It’s very intelligent and can use an incredible variety of moves. Many believe that all other Pokémon are descendants of this one.
pokedexEntries.shield: This mythical Pokémon is said to be extinct, but sightings of it are still being reported to this day.
